summary: This document discusses the potential implementation of sabotage operations against Cuban ships by AMLEGS (assets). It outlines possible consequences, including Cuban reprisals against Western carriers, increased security measures, and the reluctance of some AMLEGS to participate without assurance of a larger overthrow plan. Specific actions against the HAVANA ship are discussed, along with the potential use of explosives.
title: 1104-10308-10053 (2025 RELEASE UNDER THE PRESIDENT JOHN F. KENNEDY ASSASSINATION RECORDS ACT OF 1992)
recipient: DDP, ADDP, C/SOD, C/CI, C/FI, C/TSD, C/EE, C/SAS, S/CI
